programme.title: The Boy Who Cried Wolf
programme.desc: The shepherd boy is bored of uneventfully peaceful days. One day, he gets an idea for a prank - to lie about seeing a wolf to his village people.

programme.title: DANCE DOJO
programme.desc: The Elders assign the Guardians to master dancing, much to Xia’s annoyance. April teaches Xia a move that he uses to defeat a Worm Monster and to earn his mondojitsu Brown Socks.

programme.title: GLOVE OF THE SOUTH
programme.desc: Negu is thrilled to learn there is a Glove of the South hidden on the Guardians’ island. He sends a big-eyed mutant, The Finder, to find the glove and bring it to him. The Guardians try to stop The Finder, but fail. Luckily, when Negu dons the Glove of the South, it tickles him mercilessly! The Glove of the South was a trick, invented by the Elders!

programme.title: A Sweet Rush
programme.desc: What began as a tug of war for a six layered cake culminated in Don fixing a security alarm to the kitchen door that stopped anyone from stepping in, even Don himself. Lary Marly and Charly have found a way to dance themselves to the fridge escaping the floor sensors.

programme.title: Fly me to the Moon.
programme.desc: When Gummy admires how pretty the moon is up in the sky, he decides he wants to go there, and sets out to try and do just that in some pretty strange ways!

programme.title: CHAI-LLENGE
programme.desc: What seems like a normal day turns quite nasty for Chai Raja as he finds an elaborately dressed Japanese) at the steps of his tea shop. He also has a sumo as his assistant. The benign looking Japanese asks for a tea challenge which Chai Raja proudly take up. After all, who can beat Chai Raja?!But the Japanese proves to have some tricks up his sleeve and Chai Rajas reputation may be in danger. The Japanese man shows some stunning tea making skills. Throw into this stressed situation, the impish Basha who finds out that all the commotion just makes it easier for him to lay hands on his favourite banana fries. Chai Raja manages to match the Japanese brew for brew- even the green tea, which Chai Raja matches with his own tulsi and elaichi brew. He even somersaults, skips and even makes tea blindfolded. And he has Sundar as his assistant. The sumo assistant is totally floored by Chai Rajas performance and he applauds, only to get whacked by his boss. But then the irked Japanese presents a tea with the colours of the rainbow. It seems as if Chai Raja is ousted when, Basha chooses the moment to annoy Sundar and the two chase. They accidentally knock over the Japanese mans trunk and out fall not ingredients but readymade teabags...the Japanese man has been cheating while Chai Raja had made his brews from scratch. The Japanese man and his assistant are sent packing minus his dignity while for once Sundar and Basha sit side by side, wolfing down banana fritters served to them as reward by a beaming Chai Raja.

programme.title: Catch the Wave
programme.desc: Hey kids! Emmie our cute little elephant loves dancing & sings good english songs. Its time to enjoy the pirate song & more with Emmie! Sway and listen to great kids song like Pirate song , Rain, Catch a wave and hula hoop! Get your preschooler grooving to the beats!

programme.title: Health On My Mind
programme.desc: Colonel is in the hospital for his annual medical check-up along with Don. But Lary Marly and Charly want fun at their cost. This time, their target is poor Colonel. And Don is a helpless and frightened witness. At last colonel and don run out of the hospital to save their health.

programme.title: HOT(H)ELL
programme.desc: Chai Raja has a wedding to attend and leaves the hotels charge in Sundars hands for the first time ever. Sundar wants to prove to his boss that he is truly capable. He is all geared up and tries everything possible to make tea in his boss style. It is tea rain all over the place with the customers cringing and getting burned. It is havoc in the teashop when Basha decides to add to Sundars agony. What follows is a mad chase. And when Chai Raja returns, what remains of his beloved eashop is just the door!!!

programme.title: Smorigins
programme.desc: The Super Six go back in time to find out the origins of the Smighty Stones. The Villains tag along, too and find themselves in the middle of a prehistoric dragon battle.

programme.title: Rewind Wand
programme.desc: Nino and Deedee are out for a stroll and hear a familiar snore. Seeing postman Charlie taking a nap, they make a pillow with stones for Charlie to help him nap better. Just then Mewmew bumps into them with a jammed roller skate stuck to his leg. Deedee wants to help but she doesn’t have her magic wand, so rushes off home to get it. En route Tiggy needs help with his whisk that isn’t working and he needs to finish whisking a large batch of cupcakes. This makes Deedee rush along faster. On the way she sees the Doobydoos stuck up a rock crying out for help. She really needs her wand to help everyone, but she cannot even find the wand in her home. Nino and Deedee run out to trace their steps back along with the twins and Charlie’s hammock. Nino and Deedee use the hammock as a safety net to get the Doobydoos down from the rock. With all the Doobydoos, he helps Tiggy by presenting him with an army of whiskers. Having the work all done, Deedee takes a bowl of lemon icing to pour into Mewmew’s rollerblade shoes, and it easily comes loose. All of the rescued and helped friends of Deedee muster up to find her magic wand. Charlie sleepily walks in scratching his back, complaining of something poking him all the time during his nap, which turned out to be Deedee’s wand! Everyone’s in for a treat of freshly baked cupcakes. It certainly turned out to be an exciting non-magic day but with the magical power of friendship

programme.title: Heir To Stay
programme.desc: Sundar cleaning out the front of the shop is surprised to find a cheeky-faced snot-digging kid glaring at him bossily. Turns out its Chai Rajas one and only nephew whom the man dotes on but is in fact pest incarnate as far as Sundar is concerned. Pakru, the boy acts as if he owns the shop and finds inventive ways of harassing Sundar. Basha is amused and happily tries to help himself to some freebies while Sundar is kept occupied. But then, Basha receives a rude shock when Pakru extends his nastiness towards Basha as well! There is chaos in the shop as Pakru, being sly manages to out-think even the normally nifty Basha. Its complete chaos and the seething Basha decides to team up with Sundar and teach the bully Pakru a thing or two about defending ones territory. Pakru sensing this believes he has outprank them, but Basha and Sundar use the ace up their sleeve- their knowledge of Chai Rajas habits. With each passing minute, Chai Raja finds his favourite kettle smashed, his fritters burnt, his clocks spring sprung, his favourite spatula missing and each time Pakru is implicated! Finally losing his cool, Chai Raja boots Pakru out and Sundar gleefully turns to hi-five Basha- but the naughty monkey is already raiding the snack-shelf again! With an angry snarl, Sundar chases at Basha as the chai chai tune plays in the background.

programme.title: SPICED UP
programme.desc: It is a regular day at Hotel Kelifornia. But things change when a political convoy breaks down just in front of the hotel and the politician with his chelas come into the hotel. Chai Raja is super-excited to have VIP guest. To serve his the best of his tea, Chai Raja opens a special shelf and takes out a very specially protected rack. It is a small herbarium filled with the most exoctic tea saplings...sure to make Chai Rajas brews that much more irresistible. Sundar is assigned the responsibility of taking care of the saplings...but Basha has to stick his monkey-snout into the affairs so that Sundar would be too caught up trying to keep the exotic saplings safe from harm and would be distracted from the snack shelf which is Bashastarget.. Now Basha has two distractions to mess with and make Sundars life more miserable. Sundar stumbles, fumbles and lurches through service till his clashes with Basha ends in Sundar landing the herbarium on the VIP guest. Everything in the shop reaches the VIP guest, except for the tea. He is beaten, bruised and infuriated. And when he couldnt take it anymore and he is about to get out, poor Sundar somehow gets the tea to him. Raged beyond words, he sips the special tea.. It is heaven!!! He loves itttt. He thanks Chai Raja, and leaves the teashop a happy man (yet bruised and limping). Sundar is ecstatic. And Basha is flummoxed!

programme.title: Trick or Creep
programme.desc: Its Halloween and the Creepy Candy concoct a plan to trick poor Mr. Finkle. Their spooky prank has everyone at the library creeped out. Will Mr. Finkle discover it was them? Will he get even? Watch to find out!

programme.title: NewPointofView
programme.desc: Zoonicorn Kids Songs

programme.title: Python Problem
programme.desc: Don is trimming the hedge and humming to himself and guess what slithers out from between the bush. A python. And this is no ordinary python, he can beat up Colonel, drive a truck with its tail, stay alive in the fridge and lots more.

programme.title: Country Mouse and City Mouse
programme.desc: Country Mouse GoGo receives a letter from his urban friend UGo, and leaves for the city.

programme.title: GREASE IS THE WORD
programme.desc: Durian Grey revives the dark art of Chumpling generation while Ralph struggles with feelings of intellectual inadequacy

programme.title: Meet Zoonicorn
programme.desc: Zoonicorn Kids Songs

programme.title: PAI PROBLEM
programme.desc: The Elders assign the Guardians to guard the Magic Fort overnight. Negu sends a mutant that’s a clone of Pai. Pai has to defeat himself using his own self-knowledge.

programme.title: GET THAT GLOVE
programme.desc: The Elders assign the Guardians to guard the Glove of the North in the Magic Fort. Amkko and Koto attack the fort with a Rock-Eating Mutant. The Guardians manage (eventually) to transform into the Dragon, Panther, and Rodent Warriors to drive them off.

programme.title: Invisible Don
programme.desc: To take revenge on the rats, Don makes a potion for invisibility. He has one hell of a time playing with Charly, Marly Larry and even King Chomp. But there was some potion remaining. Oo la la! Who will drink it???

programme.title: Double Trouble
programme.desc: Sindbad is an extra-terrestrial, living his life on earth as a 14 year old boy. He and his friends Zac, Lana and Lee live regular lives, doing all the things that kids do: going to school, hanging out with friends, playing sports and computer games, doing homework and pushing back against their parents. After school, the extraordinary adventures begin. With a spaceship stored in the basement they are able to travel to planets in the 7 Galaxies. Sindbad discovers his special powers step by step. As leader of the team, he takes his friends on missions, trying to save the 7 Galaxies from disaster.

programme.title: Less is More
programme.desc: Sindbad is an extra-terrestrial, living his life on earth as a 14 year old boy. He and his friends Zac, Lana and Lee live regular lives, doing all the things that kids do: going to school, hanging out with friends, playing sports and computer games, doing homework and pushing back against their parents. After school, the extraordinary adventures begin. With a spaceship stored in the basement they are able to travel to planets in the 7 Galaxies. Sindbad discovers his special powers step by step. As leader of the team, he takes his friends on missions, trying to save the 7 Galaxies from disaster.

programme.title: NOW YOU TEA ME
programme.desc: Basha sits plotting his next move to divest the snack shelf off more kachoris when he is surprised to find his banana mocktail being drained by someone invisible. Basha soon finds out its a chameleon with a super camouflage- and the best part? If Basha too touches it, for a short while, he too can camouflage to merge with the immediate surrounding! Basha rushes to use the chameleon as to grab the kachoris. Sundar is indeed stumped for a while as he sees the kachoris magically disappear and pranks magically make him stumble and mess up the order. But then he hears Bashas chuckle and staying hidden, finds out Bashas secret. Sundar immediately tricks the chameleon out of Bashas hands and voila! Now Sundar is camouflaging. Gleefully, Sundar just starts exacting revenge when to his horror, he finds that the chameleon is an even bigger thief than Basha who is guzzling the tea as well as snacks set for the customers. Chai Raja who catches a glimpse of Sundar camouflaging after touching the chameleon and then watches the snacks and tea disappearing immediately suspects him. Sundar must now clear his image quick else he will be cleared out of Hotel California once and for all.

programme.title: Camping
programme.desc: Gummy and his pals all head off camping, with comedy and disaster joining them every step of the way!

programme.title: Street Cats
programme.desc: Cat is king at GrandPA’s house but out on the street it’s a different story. The “Mean Cats” are a local gang of street cats that always pull a fast one on Cat.

programme.title: The New Otter In Town
programme.desc: After thinking that his mother doesnt know what its like to be a kid, in the Zooniverse, Pancake becomes friends with a fun otter kid - who turns out to be his mom!. Judging people/People are often more than what they seem

programme.title: Straw
programme.desc: Reduce waste by giving straws a second more fun life!

programme.title: The Grasshopper and the Ant
programme.desc: The long, freezing winter has arrived for both the Ants, who worked hard from Spring to Autumn, and the Grasshopper, who sang and played all along.

programme.title: Paint Job
programme.desc: It is makeover time. Paint, brushes, brooms and rollers, they have it all. But the mice want the walls in a shade of red, and Don and Colonel have decided that it has to be blue. To solve the confusion, Colonel cements the mice’s house shut. What would the mice do in return?

programme.title: The Feast
programme.desc: GrandPA has some special guests visiting him. GrandPA tells Dunky in the morning to have a very tasty and mouth watering fish curry prepared for them.

programme.title: Chill Out
programme.desc: A hot summer afternoon. The fan has stopped working and the ice trays are empty, and who could be responsible for putting Don through all this sweat! Mottu Lambu and Chottu giggle as they watch Don spinning along with the fan, getting frozen inside a locked deep freezer. Colonel is all set to rescue Don, but will he succeed?

programme.title: I Gotta Go !
programme.desc: Rise and Shine Don- it’s a normal morning at the Doggy household…but wait.. whats the mice upto in the bathroom…Looks like there is no way Don can start his day normally ever!

programme.title: Swimming Class
programme.desc: Dunky wants to learn swimming so goes to the lake with a tyre tube with Keet who is helping looking at the swimming manual to tell him how to swim.

programme.title: Road Trip Snag
programme.desc: Don and Colonel is on a journey in their house on wheels. But hey! With the rats around, will they ever have a peaceful anything??? It is indeed a fun for the trio, but not for poor Don and Colonel. The house on wheels turns into a madhouse on wheels!

programme.title: Shrunken Jam
programme.desc: Don is baking a cake.In an apron.Puts the batter in a container the oven.Turns on the KNOB.And then... when he opens the oven door, the cake is missing. He cranes his neck and sees that there is a hole on the back of the oven! That is it, Charly Marly and Lary will pay for this!

programme.title: The Zoo Trip
programme.desc: Chaos unfolds as Chottu Mottu Lambu Don and Colonel decide to make a trip to the zoo. Starting from feeding the animals, from sneaking into the control room and opening the enclosures and racing crocodiles, they mess it all.

programme.title: What a mess!
programme.desc: The twins meet a girl who lost the key to her bike lock because she’s so untidy.

programme.title: Prickly Pair
programme.desc: Nino is having a tough time trying to put his daisies up as desired to win the Wonderful Window Box competition that Mayor De Pfeffle is hosting. Deedee cheers him up by saying that flowers can be placed anywhere as long as it makes Abra-Dabra more beautiful. Just then Mewmew runs in all flustered and panicky. The problem seems to be that the creeper plant at Mewmew’s window hasn’t grown big enough to creep all around the heart-shaped support. But Deedee can’t help with magic, as it would be unfair in the competition against everyone else. Charlie loves his display but is being overprotective by shooing the twins away to play ball elsewhere. The twins accidentally throw the ball directly at Uncle Charlie’s display, knocking them all down and breaking them in the process. But there’s no time to fix them up without magic. Deedee brews a magic potion with a few ingredients. The magic potion makes all of Charlie’s flowers into cacti, something Charlie dislikes the most. Since Deedee feels she’s let Charlie down, they all decide to take theor very own flowers to replace Charlie’s exhibit. But with a sudden spelt of rain, all are damaged by the time they reach Charlie’s. But the rain has also caused the cacti to bloom, a rare sight indeed. Mayor De Pfeffle awards Uncle Charlie with the honour of being winner of the Wonderful Window Boz contest. But Charlie wants to share the award with all his friends

programme.title: The Gigantic Turnip
programme.desc: A gigantic turnip grows in the fields of the peasant GoGo grandpa. He tries to pull out an enormous, heavy turnip with the help of grandma, cats, and mice.

programme.title: “Moo”-Ing Trouble!
programme.desc: Help! There is a cow in the bathroom this time, and he is on a mad eating spree, happily mooing away soap bubbles too!Don & Colonel try in vain to get rid of the cow but the three mice seem to have a different agenda. To make matters worse, a bull has made its grand entry into the scene too

programme.title: BUDDY SYSTEM
programme.desc: Xia rejects April’s advice on a fighting move, accepting the identical advice from Pai. Maestra Saku says today they’ll study using the Buddy System. Xia’s paired with Saku and has to knit while April and Pai learn much more exciting lessons in the forest. But the knitting lessons pay off when Xia uses his new skills to rescue April and Pai from a giant mutant spider. Xia learns females give excellent advice on fighting!

programme.title: Banding Together
programme.desc: When Maple joins the Zoonicorns’ band, her off-kilter playing disrupts the entire Zooniverse. Working together/Not giving up.

programme.title: THE LILY OF THE EAST:
programme.desc: The Guardians take a welcome break from brainteasers to go fetch pollen from the Lily of the East, which only grows in one faraway cave. Everyone (including Negu) is convinced the flower’s pollen bestows magical powers. After an arduous journey through a bamboo forest and a series of caves, the Guardians reach the lily. But Koto and Amkko (who have been following in disguise) snatch the flower! By distracting the two mutants with riddles, the Guardians regain the precious flower and its pollen, which the Elders wanted…to flavor their tea!

programme.title: The Wet Cat
programme.desc: Cat is chasing Keet in the mud and gets dirty, GrandPA is in the garden watering the plants he points the hose pipe to Cat and gets him wet and tells Dunky to give him a long due bath. Much to Keets amusement.

programme.title: Dimsum To Go
programme.desc: A bowl of lip smacking Dimsums and four pair of eyes. Don tries his best to hide it but in vain! Watch Don and the mice chase each other in this quest.

programme.title: FRUITFUL MULTIPLICATION
programme.desc: Four green Fruit Ninjas find their first real-life enemy in the form of an ancient ninja with a score to settle.

programme.title: Runaway Custard
programme.desc: Tiggy is busy making custard and Deedee and Nino are helping out. But Mayor De Pfeffle cannot seem to understand what happened to his purple custard freshly sent over by Nino. So Mewmew offers to help while taking eggs over to Tiggy’s. But the carton turns out to only have one egg, and Tiggy needs to make eight more jars of purple custard. The answer seems to lie in Deedee’s magic spell that makes one purple custard jar never run out of purple custard for the entire day. And it works like a charm, non-stop purple custard. The Mayor gets a half eaten jar of purple custard and keeps it safe for after, only to have it finished by the Doobydoos. As the Mayor turns up at Tiggy’s once more for more purple custard, he rushes off with the jar that the spell has been cast on. A happy Mayor gets Mewmew to stay guard of the jar while he is out, and Mewmew catches the Doobydoos red handed trying to eat the custard. But the jar tips over in the confusion and unknown to Mewmew the loyal custard guard, the bottle keeps on flowing till it reaches the ground floor. Deedee is called in urgency and only Nino can fly up the building and put the jar right up again. Having done that they call all the townsfolk to come to town hall to eat up as much purple custard as they can. All join in and have a hearty treat, so much so that they cannot have a bite more. Finally Mayor De Pfeffle arrives and is happy to share his purple custard with everyone, but much to his surprise no one wants any. Wonder why?

programme.title: OH, RATS!
programme.desc: It’s quiet…TOO quiet, according to Pai, who’s convinced Negu’s about to attack. Pai prepares a trap. But the evil lord of the Chou World is depressed by all his failures. Mei decides to launch an attack himself. He can only get one mutant rat to follow him…who in turn is followed by lots of fellow mutant rats. The Guardians laugh at Mei and his rats, but the rats have a secret weapon: horrible, high-pitched SCREAMS! Pai knits earmuffs for himself, April, and Xia, then lures the rats onto his trap with cheese. In the end, Pai savors the silence.

programme.title: THE WATERFALL OF LIFE
programme.desc: The balance and harmony of the Yan World are knocked out of whack when Negu sends a giant mutant toad to plug up the Waterfall of Life. The Guardians have to drive off the toad and repair the stone lotus through which the water flows. Balance and harmony are restored!

programme.title: A Book for a Book
programme.desc: Cat is sick of Keet winning all the time. He runs through the newspapers and sees an ad of a book ”10 ways to catch a parrot”.

programme.title: Double Trouble
programme.desc: Sindbad is an extra-terrestrial, living his life on earth as a 14 year old boy. He and his friends Zac, Lana and Lee live regular lives, doing all the things that kids do: going to school, hanging out with friends, playing sports and computer games, doing homework and pushing back against their parents. After school, the extraordinary adventures begin. With a spaceship stored in the basement they are able to travel to planets in the 7 Galaxies. Sindbad discovers his special powers step by step. As leader of the team, he takes his friends on missions, trying to save the 7 Galaxies from disaster.

programme.title: Christmas
programme.desc: Its Christmas and Keet and Cat are given the task of decorating the house with a Christmas tree, a small stable and stars, while Dunky is making a nice Christmas cake for the day.

programme.title: Mouse Trap
programme.desc: Fred and Sir Percival are swapping practical jokes against each other. When Fred meets a hyper-intelligent mouse that Brains has, he “borrows” him to pull one last great prank. When the mouse goes missing, Brains informs them that no one else can defend them against the beastly Elephantoids!

programme.title: The Wrestler
programme.desc: Cat notices that Katreena is a big fan of “macho man” a well built super star .He needs to build his physique and impress her.

programme.title: Baghdad in Bloom
programme.desc: Aladdin buys magic seeds from the market with the food money believing the plant will bring him riches. However when it doesnt grow he and Jamillah enlist Genie to help, he does his thing and suddenly the plant grows! Everyone in town hears about the plant and comes to see it in Aladdins garden - hoping that they too will get blessed with riches. Even the Sultan comes to see its beauty. The crowd waits with bated breath but when it opens - it stinks like smelly cheese. The crowd disperse but the Sultan is transfixed by the rare scent. He sees the value and beauty in it where others dont and gives Aladdin gold in exchange for the plant.

programme.title: Charlie’s Castle
programme.desc: It’s Uncle Charlie’s birthday and the twins have surprised him with a nap mask and breakfast, but the twins want to celebrate a little more by throwing a party and inviting all their friends. Although Charlie wishes to have a more peaceful celebration, he gives in to the pleas of Boris and Sandy. After getting a hint from Charlie on how much he loves chess, boris and sandy plan the birthday party around a ‘knights and castles’ theme. The twins get Deedee to bring balloons, a castle cake with turrets from Tiggy and a jousting dance from Mewmew. Boris and Sandy set out to decorate Uncle Charlie’s house, just in time for their friends coming in with all the goodies for the party. They even invent a balloon jousting game between Deedee and Mewmew that makes Mewmew crash into Tiggy’s cake and thereby wreck all the arrangements much to the dismay of the twins. This calls for Deedee’s magic where all the party ingredients are put into a large purple cauldron and it makes a gigantic bouncing castle in the chequerboard garden. And the snoring sounds lead them to find Uncle Charlie napping right inside it. They bounce around Uncle Charlie as much as they can and then wind down for a long snooze. Uncle Charlie awakes to happily find that the twins have organised his most best birthday slumber party ever.

programme.title: Science Unfair
programme.desc: Fred is not prepared to enter the school science fair, but at the last minute, he transforms Friday into a glove that dispenses soda from the fingers. He wins! Soon he learns though that the fair was an effort to find someone with small enough hands to blast into space and rescue the stranded Astronaut, and Brains’ hero, Caribou Caruthers.

programme.title: Planet Gadget
programme.desc: Sindbad is an extra-terrestrial, living his life on earth as a 14 year old boy. He and his friends Zac, Lana and Lee live regular lives, doing all the things that kids do: going to school, hanging out with friends, playing sports and computer games, doing homework and pushing back against their parents. After school, the extraordinary adventures begin. With a spaceship stored in the basement they are able to travel to planets in the 7 Galaxies. Sindbad discovers his special powers step by step. As leader of the team, he takes his friends on missions, trying to save the 7 Galaxies from disaster.

programme.title: SuperCat
programme.desc: Cat watches his favorite super hero “SuperCat” on tv and is inspired to be like him in every way even fly like him.

programme.title: The Riddle Champion - Rumpelstiltskin
programme.desc: SANDRA and FO travel into the story of Rumpelstiltskin, by the Brothers Grimm, having been called out by the young QUEEN, the protagonist of the story. Something terrible and very strange has happened: the SERVANT, who the QUEEN sent to find out the DWARF’s name, has not returned. As the QUEEN did not know his name, the DWARF has taken her baby. SANDRA and FO set off in search of the little prince and to take on the powerful, magic RUMPELSTILTSKIN, who is a great enthusiast of riddles and puzzles.

programme.title: The Green Monkey - The Thousand And One Nights
programme.desc: The fairytale detective SANDRA and her assistant FO travel into the exotic world of The Thousand and One Nights, having been called out by the VIZIER of Baghdad. His daughter, SCHEHERAZADE has mysteriously lost her voice, when there is just one more night to go to reach the magic number 1001. If SANDRA and FO don’t manage to solve the case and remedy the problem, SCHEHERAZADE will not be able to tell the last story to the SULTAN and will be executed the next morning

programme.title: Two Tickets.
programme.desc: When Gummy wins two tickets to a big dance show, each of his best pals vie to be the one he gives the coveted second ticket to.

programme.title: Runaway Custard
programme.desc: Tiggy is busy making custard and Deedee and Nino are helping out. But Mayor De Pfeffle cannot seem to understand what happened to his purple custard freshly sent over by Nino. So Mewmew offers to help while taking eggs over to Tiggy’s. But the carton turns out to only have one egg, and Tiggy needs to make eight more jars of purple custard. The answer seems to lie in Deedee’s magic spell that makes one purple custard jar never run out of purple custard for the entire day. And it works like a charm, non-stop purple custard. The Mayor gets a half eaten jar of purple custard and keeps it safe for after, only to have it finished by the Doobydoos. As the Mayor turns up at Tiggy’s once more for more purple custard, he rushes off with the jar that the spell has been cast on. Finally Mayor De Pfeffle arrives and is happy to share his purple custard with everyone, but much to his surprise no one wants any. Wonder why?

programme.title: Melody's Powerful Music
programme.desc: Sneevil creates a powerful magnet to draw an iron asteroid towards Smightyland. Melody must summon her power of rock to blast the asteroid out of the sky before its too late.

programme.title: Game On
programme.desc: Sindbad is an extra-terrestrial, living his life on earth as a 14 year old boy. He and his friends Zac, Lana and Lee live regular lives, doing all the things that kids do: going to school, hanging out with friends, playing sports and computer games, doing homework and pushing back against their parents. After school, the extraordinary adventures begin. With a spaceship stored in the basement they are able to travel to planets in the 7 Galaxies. Sindbad discovers his special powers step by step. As leader of the team, he takes his friends on missions, trying to save the 7 Galaxies from disaster.

programme.title: Mood Music
programme.desc: Deedee and Nino hear the most horrible sounds ever and run out to find Mewmew playing his violin. And to top it off he’s inviting everyone to hear him play at the concert. Deedee encourages Mewmew along, but everyone turns her down after hearing what Mewmew plays. Tiggy throws a shoe at Mewmew mistaking the music for cats screeching, even the Doobydoos scram. Tika Pila is also enraged that Mewmew walks away so dejected. Deedee weaves a spell that makes the violin plays with so much emotion that Nino sheds a tear. Now Mewmew has to muster her spirit and prove to all of Abra-Dabra that she can really play well. First stop is at Tiggy’s, and when Mewmew plays a melancholic tune, Tiggy cries so much that Mewmew walks away sadly. The Doobydoos cry as well to the point that Mewmew totally hates what Deedee has conjured. Deedee and Nino notice that Mewmew’s violin plays according to the state of Mewmew’s emotions. Deedee and Nino devise a plan and Nino keeps Mewmew happy and practising while Deedee rounds up the townsfolk to attend the concert. Charlie goes to get the twins, but takes a quick nap instead. Though all take a while to come, Deedee and Nino lift Mewmew’s spirits so high that the entire town come rushing to the concert on hearing the joyful music Mewmew is playing. And even thought the magic spell wears off, the town still encourage Mewmew to keep on playing, for she had already proved the very best to all of them.

programme.title: Cruise Blues
programme.desc: On the deck of the cruise, Titanic-style Don and Colonel stand facing the sea, enjoying the breeze until the shark leaps up in the air. Where ever Don is, Charly Lary and Marly are sure to follow. Watch them battle sharks and take on the sea!

programme.title: The New Fred
programme.desc: After Fred clumsily insults Nora, he commands Friday to do his talking for him, transforming into a neck piece Fred wears, imitating his voice, and giving him a shock when he tries to speak for himself. Friday’s bold personality rehabilitates Fred’s reputation, until he short circuits and starts insulting everyone.

programme.title: Ant Attack!
programme.desc: It is a usual day in the house with the war between the dogs and the rats. And there is a new group. In fact an army of enemies – ants! And they make the life in the house a living hell. For the first time Don , Colonel and the rat trio get a real taste of the bad ants.

programme.title: Baby Sitting
programme.desc: It’s the summer holidays. GrandPA’s daughter is visiting her dad from the neighboring town with her year old baby.

programme.title: Misadventure
programme.desc: The painter inside Don has woken and he must have his painting on the wall. But the rats are ready even to turn the world upside down to stop Don from fulfilling his dream. And you can imagine what will follow. But whatever happens in between, it is all a sweet happy ending.

programme.title: I Cant Fall A sleep
programme.desc: Duda is hanging his Smoofy blanket to dry. Its been his good friend since he was a baby and he needs it to sleep every night. A strong wind blows Smoofy to Scots hideout and Scot decides to turn him into his cape. When Duda realizes that his Smoofy is gone, he becomes distraught and cannot fall asleep. The friends go butterfly exploring the next day; However, Dudas exhaustion from a restless night ruins his expedition. After discovering Dudas problem, the friends try to help him fall asleep. Soon, Scot shows up with a sleep-inducing invention, and inadvertently reunites Doubt with his precious Smoofy. But Scot wont give up Smoofy without a fight.

programme.title: Horizontes del amor
programme.desc: Varya no cree en los hombres y cría sola a su hija, cuando Ilya aparece en su vida.

programme.title: Horizontes del amor
programme.desc: Varya no cree en los hombres y cría sola a su hija, cuando Ilya aparece en su vida.

programme.title: Dime la verdad
programme.desc: El hogar de Nastia resultó ser una farsa. Su esposo es arrestado y ella se entera de que él le es infiel.

programme.title: Dime la verdad
programme.desc: El hogar de Nastia resultó ser una farsa. Su esposo es arrestado y ella se entera de que él le es infiel.

programme.title: Love At First Bite
programme.desc: Xi Yue, a staunch believer of fate, meets the rational and cold Martius whom she believes bring her bad luck. Unknown to her, Martius has been quietly helping Xi Yue achieve her culinary dream.

programme.title: Super Dad
programme.desc: "Xu Wei Hao (Thomas Ong) and Li Zheng Yi (Jeremy Chan) are neighbours who share one thing in common, both men are looked down upon by their wives and children. They receive a mysterious box of chocolates one day, thinking it was a mistake by the post office, Wei Hao and Zheng Yi each took a piece of the chocolate. Zheng Yi, once a cowardly policeman, suddenly possesses superb ability in solving a crime. While Wei Hao regains the respect of his daughter by saving her when she fell from a building. Chen Kai (Chen Han Wei), the ex-husband of Zheng Yi’s wife, was released from jail and tries to seek forgiveness. Seeing his sincerity in turning over a new leaf, Zheng Yi took him in. He accidentally took a piece of the chocolate and discovers its super power. The trio starts to rely on the chocolate every time they needed its super power to solve problems, making them the "Xu Wei Hao (Thomas Ong) and Li Zheng Yi (Jeremy Chan) are neighbours who share one thing in common, both men are looked down upon by their wives and children. They receive a mysterious box of chocolates one day, thinking it was a mistake by the post office, Wei Hao and Zheng Yi each took a piece of the chocolate. Zheng Yi, once a cowardly policeman, suddenly possesses superb ability in solving a crime. While Wei Hao regains the respect of his daughter by saving her when she fell from a building. Chen Kai (Chen Han Wei), the ex-husband of Zheng Yi’s wife, was released from jail and tries to seek forgiveness. Seeing his sincerity in turning over a new leaf, Zheng Yi took him in. He accidentally took a piece of the chocolate and discovers its super power. The trio starts to rely on the chocolate every time they needed its super power to solve problems, making them the Super Dad in their children’s eyes. One day, the three fathers see their own children in danger, but there is only one piece of chocolate left. Will they fight to see who gets the last piece of chocolate or will they count on their own will to save their children?" in their children’s eyes. programme.title: Incredible Tales Sr 7
programme.desc: Hosted by Utt, Incredible Tales returns for Season 7, featuring more ghoulish stories of paranormal encounters from Singapore, Malaysia, Thailand and Philippines. Incredible Tales is all about ghost stories told through generations, crossing boundaries of culture and language. Stories that generate intrigue, fascination, and fear.

programme.title: 20 Days
programme.desc: Everyone views singlehood differently. For Edrick ( Elvin Ng) , it is the pain of not being able to find the right girl. As for his brother, Wesley (Nat Ho) , it signifies a life of freedom. Yet for Edrick’s best friend Jess (Felicia Chin), she simply blames her old-fashioned mother, who forced her to focus on her studies instead.

programme.title: Vettai
programme.desc: "They are part of a special task force assembled to tackle cases pertaining to the Indian community and Indian immigrants. The unit is not widely publicized and their work is kept under wraps. Spearheaded by Chief Dayanidhi, the team consists of three teams and an assigned criminologist. Together they try to tackle cold blooded murders, kidnaps and sexual crimes. But as their professional and personal lives collide, the team is headed towards a perilous outcome. Lives will be lost and bonds will be broken. The pledge that they made to uphold justice and peace in the country that they love will be put to the test. How will they survive? Where does it all lead to? Who is the villain and who is the hero?"

programme.title: Cookin' with Gags 1955
programme.desc: The boys are taking Olive on a picnic. It's April 1, and Bluto plays a series of "jokes" on Popeye, though of course they go beyond the bounds of acceptability, particularly once they get to the picnic grounds; Bluto puts gasoline on the fire he asks Popeye to light and swaps a beehive for the lemonade. Bluto then launches a cruel joke against Olive and frames Popeye. The capper: he replaces Popeye's spinach with a joke can, and runs off with Olive for some canoeing. But Popeye gets the last laugh with an inflatable sea monster.

programme.title: A Distant Place
programme.desc: After settling down at a sheep ranch in Hwacheon five years ago, Jin-woo has been raising his niece Seol like his own daughter with his same-sex partner Hyun-min. One day, Jin-woo's twin sister Eun-young who is the birth mother of Seol turns up at their doorstep and insists on taking Seol with her. As Jin-woo hesitates to send Seol to Eun-young, Eun-young, out of anger, discloses his relationship with Hyun-min in front of Jin-woo's neighbors.

programme.title: El Hijo Del Presidente
programme.desc: A young and oblivious rich guy is kidnapped with one of his bodyguards after being seen in a disco giving away money. His captors soon discover they unexpectedly have captured the President's son, so they decide to teach him a lesson about the way of life in their hood.

programme.title: Cuatro Esquinas
programme.desc: Juan Manaure, the only Venezuelan who has the chance to play one-on-one with Michael Jordan, started his career as a young humble boy in a slum debating himself between follow his dreams of basketball glory or falling dawn into the tempting abyss of a life in crime.

programme.title: Burn Rate
programme.desc: On this episode of Burn Rate, host Bryan Baiss is joined by cigar enthusiasts Mark and Alex to review the My Father Fonseca cigar. Together, they examine its smooth, balanced flavors, flawless construction, and overall performance, sharing their insights on why this cigar is a favorite among connoisseurs.

programme.title: Unrolled
programme.desc: In this episode of Unrolled, Sean explores Central Cigars, a cornerstone of St. Petersburg‚Äôs cigar scene, highlighting its rich history, expertly curated cigar selection, and the passionate community it fosters.

programme.title: Behind the Blend
programme.desc: Sean sits down with Lynn Hawkins of Placencia Cigars, one of the most respected names in the industry. Lynn pulls back the curtain on Placencia's extensive history as a leading grower and producer, sharing insights into their meticulous tobacco cultivation, the intricate art of their cigar manufacturing process, and what makes their family's legacy truly stand out in the world of premium cigars.

programme.title: Behind the Blend
programme.desc: Kevin shares the inspiring story behind his brand, delving into the intentionality and philosophy that shape each blend. Discover what makes Konscious Cigars Co. stand out in the vibrant Tampa cigar scene and the mindful approach Kevin brings to the world of premium tobacco.

programme.title: Unrolled
programme.desc: The El Rojo cigar factory is the oldest working cigar factory in the United States. Join us as we take an in depth look at what it takes to turn tobacco leaves into a premium hand rolled cigar.

programme.title: Behind the Blend
programme.desc: Established in 2019, Drunk Chicken Cigars (DC Cigars) are handmade in the U.S.A. to create premium flavor profiles. Every combination of tobacco leaf, including the filler, binder, and wrapper, was chosen to produce an assortment of smooth, rich, and savory cigars with a variety of customers in mind. Join Sean has he dicusses the mission of the DC Cigars family is to produce premium cigars that can be smoked anytime of the day.

programme.title: Behind the Blend
programme.desc: Join host Sean Mobley as he sits down with Maurice Mears, the founder of JM Patriarch Cigars. In this episode, Maurice shares the story and inspiration behind his line of cigars, delving into the blends, tobacco selections, and the philosophy that drives the JM Patriarch brand. Get an inside look at the passion and dedication that goes into crafting these distinguished smokes.

programme.title: Burn Rate
programme.desc: On this episode of Burn Rate, host Bryan Baiss is joined by cigar expert Kyle Lenz to review the Ashton cigar. They dive into its smooth, refined flavors, flawless construction, and overall smoking experience, sharing their thoughts on what makes Ashton a staple in the world of cigars.

programme.title: Unrolled
programme.desc: Join us as we take a behind the scenes tour of Florida's largest independent tobacco farm. Jeff Borysiewicz guides us through his tobacco farm, sharing tricks of the trade and everything that goes into the process of producing high quality cigar tobacco.

programme.title: Guest Babyface
programme.desc: Babyface is a legend. Songwriter, producer, singer — he’s made lots of the greatest songs of the past few decades. We talk about music — how this obsession started, how he makes it, and a deep look into some of the songs he’s made.

programme.title: Guest Ashley Capri
programme.desc: Starr Rocque chats with Brooklyn Nets Dancer, costume designer, and entrepreneur Ashley Capri about upcoming swimwear line, creating the vision for the Nets dance teams, and more.

programme.title: Guest Tobias Dorzon
programme.desc: Tobias Dorzon played running back in the NFL briefly and then went to culinary school and became a serious chef. He is the owner and creator of Huncho House in Hyattsville, Maryland, and he’s brilliant. Amazing convo about playing in the NFL and being a chef and running a restaurant.

programme.title: Animal House!
programme.desc: Watch heroes work with overcrowded, underfunded animal shelters in this uplifting, series!

programme.title: From Hunter to Vegan Sanctuary Owner
programme.desc: Mark Wakeling's dream? Turn all animal farms into animal sanctuaries His personal story is why.

programme.title: Ahimsa & Environment: Making Peace with Nature
programme.desc: Watch Ahimsa & the Environment and learn how you can be the change you wish to see in the world.

programme.title: New Day New Chef - Downtown Squash
programme.desc: Ron Russell creates an impressive butternut squash coulis with roasted vegetables & vegan feta cream

programme.title: New Day New Chef - Chef AJ's Potato Pizza & "Cheese"cake
programme.desc: Chef AJ, creates an impressive Double Potato Panini Pizza that will spike your potato cravings and a decadent Strawberry Chocolate Cheesecake that will leave you begging for more.

programme.title: The Elevator (ITN)
programme.desc: A reporter discovers all is not as it seems at an infamous hotel...

programme.title: Horror High 2020 Tyler J. Case
programme.desc: A monster lurks around a high school in the hypnotized town of Willow Hills and picks off tardy students one by one. Now it is up to an unlikely group of teens to put an end to the terror that has plagued many...

programme.title: Lake Terror
programme.desc: Remington has escaped the evil cabin but now the evil continues to follow him, wreaking havoc wherever he goes. Meanwhile, Chloe and Revel look for a missing sister that went to the evil cabin in the previous installment. The two meet Vincent, a failing TV host, to help psychically contact the missing sister. That's when a gunshot rings out in the night and the three meet Remington. Now they all must battle for their lives against the evil that pursues Remington to once and for all lock the evil away for good...

programme.title: El Culto de Humpty Dumpty
programme.desc: Un grupo de adolescentes con problemas y su maestra deben luchar por sobrevivir después de descubrir que una secta ha devuelto la vida a Humpty Dumpty, un muñeco asesino, y lo ha liberado en el campamento en el que se encuentran...

programme.title: El Bosque del Diablo
programme.desc: Rachel y su equipo de cineastas viajan a Transilvania, Rumania, para documentar los fenómenos paranormales en el bosque de Hoia-Baciu...

programme.title: Mi Sangriento Cumpleaños
programme.desc: Tras un terrible trauma en su cumpleaños, Emma decide no volver a celebrarlo. Pero al cumplir 21, una amiga rompe el ritual con una fiesta sorpresa, sin percatarse del despertar de los horrores que durante años han estado acechando en la oscuridad...

programme.title: Catemaco: Magia y Misterio
programme.desc: Una familia normal va de vacaciones a Catemaco, Michoacan un pueblo famoso y pintoresco en Mexico. Todo marcha bien hasta que son atacados por criminales, el padre sobrevive, y con ayuda del brujo mayor del pueblo cobra venganza.

programme.title: Asesinos Sin Ley
programme.desc: Mickey y Jenny son imigrantes indocumentados, un dia el patrón de Jenny trata de abusar de ella, Mickey lo sorprende y lo mata haceindo justicia por su propia mano así se desatan una cacería de criminales abusadores, todo lo sueben a las redes convirtiéndose en los anti-héroes más populares por hacer justicia a los desamparados.

programme.title: El Gavilán Justiciero
programme.desc: Historia llena de acción donde la codicia y la ambición desatan la más cruenta lucha, que trae como consecuencia el sufrimiento de una familia y la envidia de otra.

programme.title: El Deseo de Domingo
programme.desc: Narra la historia de Domingo, un adulto mayor que sufre Alzheimer y pasa sus días en un geriátrico en la ciudad de Viedma, desde donde intenta, a toda costa, viajar a la Capital, a San Isidro, a ver el gran premio de turf Carlos Pellegrini. Pero claro, no se trata de cualquier premio, sino el del año 1952. Para eso necesitará de la ayuda de Marcelo, su nieto, quien se encuentra en el dilema de conformarse con su puesto en una dependencia pública o seguir luchando por triunfar con su banda de rock. …

programme.title: Call TV
programme.desc: Lucía, una actriz en decadencia, acepta presentar un programa nocturno de preguntas tontas. Sin darse cuenta de que se ha metido en un gran lío que le hará pasar la peor noche de su vida

programme.title: Cuando Yo Te Vuelva a Ver
programme.desc: Treinta años después de haberse radicado en España, Paco regresa a la Argentina para apadrinar la boda de un amigo. Retirado y separado de su esposa española, se reencuentra con sus afectos. Como siempre, en los últimos treinta años, Margarita, ya jubilada como docente, arrastra hacia adelante su vida. En la fiesta de casamiento, Paco como padrino y Margarita como encargada del servicio de catering, se cruzan nuevamente aunque sin encontrarse, hasta que él la descubre en un video de la fiesta. El amor truncado por la ausencia y la negativa de ella a responder sus cartas, vuelve a renacer en una búsqueda por recuperar el tiempo perdido.

programme.title: Catemaco: Magia y Misterio
programme.desc: Una familia normal va de vacaciones a Catemaco, Michoacan un pueblo famoso y pintoresco en Mexico. Todo marcha bien hasta que son atacados por criminales, el padre sobrevive, y con ayuda del brujo mayor del pueblo cobra venganza.

programme.title: 48 Horas de Terror
programme.desc: Mateo un escritor citadino adquiere una casa de campo en donde planea vivir con su esposa y escribir en la tranquilidad del campo, pero no tomo en cuenta las trágicas noticias de los acontecimientos de canibalismo que ocurrieron a manos de sus vecinos quienes solo buscan sacias su hambre. Mateo y su esposa corren por sus vidas entre las desoladas montañas buscando sobrevivir al ataque de estos caníbales al final sobrevivirá el más fuerte

programme.title: Expediente 53
programme.desc: Esta es una historia de misterio y acción en la ciudad de Bryan Texas el comandante Gatel pide la ayuda del FBI ya que hay muchos desaparecidos, y asesinatos en la ciudad. Los agentes Gutiérrez, Bracho y Miravalle del FBI le comentan al comandante Gatel que ellos sospechan que puede ser obra de una secta satánica y que el líder es un demonio de nombre Abal que está en el cuerpo de una bella mujer de nombre Lilly.
